name: The Amazing Spider-Man: Worldwide Vol. 4
description: Going global continues to mean a world of problems for the wall-crawler! First, there's an accident to deal with at Parker Industries. How far will Peter Parker go to save his employees - both as CEO and as Spider-Man? Meanwhile, you - and stand-in Spidey, the Prowler - get to meet the all-new Electro! Who is she and what does she have to do with the Man in Red? The Prowler might not like the shocking answers! Plus a special tale setting the scene for the sensational Spider-Event Dead No More!
